Package fol

Class Atom

java.lang.Object
fol.Sentence
fol.Atom
public class Atom extends Sentence
Defines a first-order logic atom. The general form is p(t1, t2, ...) where p is the predicate and each t_i is a term. The number of terms is determined by the arity of the predicate. A term can be a constant or a variable.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Atom(Predicate pred, Term... terms)
    Create an atom using the predicate, and all remaining arguments as terms.
